content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(52.5, 51.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position 52.5, 51.5)
- Electric poles (positions 55.5, 51.5 and 55.5, 54.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure there is no obstruction in the target location before placing electric poles. Check for terrain unplaceability (e.g., water) or other entities blocking the placement.

### Errors when inserting coal into steam engine
- Make sure that there is a nearby entity that can accept coal before attempting to insert it into the steam engine. Verify the proximity of the coal source to the steam engine.
